OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE AND NORTH EAST MIDLANDS VOLUNTARY CONSORTIUM FOR SOCIAL WORK EDUCATION

Desc.entry: Works in partnership with both Universities in Sheffield and with voluntary and independent sector organisations to provide placements for social work students who are training for their social work qualification. Company limited by guarantee no 4278513.

ContactName.entry: Peter Duff, Business Manager/Nell Farrell, Service Development Manager
